Name: MY NEEDY NEIGHBOUR GIRLS
About the game: These hot young women live in the same building as you, but they have no idea how to fix anything around the house. When their appliances break down or their car needs fixing, they call on you for help. But while you're doing that, there's a chance they'll get bored of waiting and decide to take matters into their own hands. They can't stop thinking about sex, and their libidos are always going wild. So instead of making themselves useful by helping you, they end up seducing you for a quickie in the shower or on the couch. Features: - Unique match 3 puzzle mechanics! - Sexy, slutty girls - Gameplay that combines puzzle solving with visual novel! Gameplay consists of solving a puzzle level. Once you've solved the puzzle you can move onto the next scene. There are 3 girls and each one has her own story and progression. You'll get to know these girls better and see more of their sexy bodies as you play through the game. Each girl is different!
